sentences.sContent: So, we should draw maybe this downward parabola.
sentences.sContent_eng: So, we should draw maybe this downward parabola.
sentences.sCn: 我们可以画出这样的开口向下的抛物线。

sentences.sContent: From this one, you would not expect it to behave like a parabola.
sentences.sContent_eng: From this one, you would not expect it to behave like a parabola.
sentences.sCn: 从这一次，你不会期待它，如抛物线般运动。

sentences.sContent: It is perfectly reasonable to immediately come to that conclusion because of the symmetry of the parabola.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is perfectly reasonable to immediately come to that conclusion because of the symmetry of the parabola.
sentences.sCn: 很理所应当的,由于抛物线的对称,立刻就会想到这个结论。

words.tran: 抛物线的；比喻的；寓言的

trans.tranOther: a curve in the shape of the imaginary line an object makes when it is thrown high in the air and comes down a little distance away
